feature_model.name: Small Graph Product Line

meta.data: A model of a graph product line

feature_model.feature_tree: :r GPL(GPL) :m Graph_Type(Graph_Type) :g (_r_1_2) [1,1] : directed(directed) : undirected(undirected) :g (_r_1_5) [1,1] : weighted(weighted) : unweighted(unweighted) :o search(search) :g (_r_8_9) [1,1] : DFS(DFS) : BFS(BFS) :m Algorithms(Algorithms) :g (_r_12_13) [1,*] : Shortest_Path(Shortest_Path) : Coloring(Coloring) :g (_r_12_13_16_20) [1,*] : Approximation(Approximation) : Brute_Force(Brute_Force) : Cycle_Detection(Cycle_Detection) : MST(MST) : Strongly_Connected(Strongly_Connected)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_6:directed or ~Strongly_Connected constraint_4:DFS or ~Cycle_Detection constraint_5:DFS or ~Strongly_Connected
